TopicTitle: Mad at myself/ But happy at the same TIME :D

Articles.Content:
Well.... im not really sure when the last time the KSP forums and spaceport and things like that went down. But im pretty sure it was somewhere around March 25-30th?

When it did go down I could not reach it. But I had the forums as a favorite. So everyday i would log on and check the KSP forums. So for the past Month and a half I've been doing this. And it hasn't been up. All it said that the Forums and the Spaceport were under maintence and i could not reach them no matter what!

So on May 5th (today) I decided for the first time to see if the main website was down... and to my excitement it wasn't! I looked at the articles and found a article that stated that the forums and spaceport were up (April 18) so I was like WTF! I could not connect to it and neither the spaceport. The twitch live stream has never updated besides that special Wednesday live stream. I was all confused!

So with my doubt I decided to click on the tab that said (Forums) on the main page, because I really thought that KSP was never to come back. Then BOOOM the website came alive!!!!! and so did the spaceport! So I was thinking from the last time I checked the forums it was down like 30 mins ago.... and now its up! I quickly read the new .20 update review blog posted by Harv. And then i felt stupid. This hole TIME THE FORUMS WERE UP AND FOR THE PAST 1 MONTH, 1 WEEK, AND 2 DAYS IVE BEEN MISSING IT!

But anywho... im glad that im now able to join KSP again

And thank god i didn't miss out on the .20 release.

If anyone has an solution on what might of happened to me or something plz say so. BUT IM BACK BABY!!!!!!!!!!!!

Also hi to everyone on the forums... its like i just signed up for the first time. A new Era has just begun!
Your browser may have still had a cache for the maintenance page and so may have taken you to that.

Your browser may have still had a cache for the maintenance page and so may have taken you to that.

o well then....
